title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama allowing easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama with both Node & browser support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama letting you use local models in LangChain chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama with folder organization, code highlighting & multimodal support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama providing idiomatic Ruby access to local LLMs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, prompts library & model search.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion engine for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models in production-ready RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into any Discord server.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama for local LLM chats.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with async HTTP and WebSocket streaming support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with context-based cancellation and streaming.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama with GPU (CUDA/ROCm) and CPU variants.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI-friendly service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of 150+ models (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.) ready to pull.
